content: 안녕하세요! 저는 레이첼입니다. 저는 학습장애를 가진 아이들과 대화를 나누고 있어요. 무엇을 도와드릴까요?
Yes, I can hear you. How can I assist you today?
Recommend a new song to me.

Sure! What kind of music do you like? Pop, rock, hip-hop, or something else? Let me know and I can suggest a new song for you to check out. In the meantime, tell me about some songs or artists you already enjoy!
